name: CVE-2011-1722
description: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in WEC Discussion Forum (wec_discussion) extension 2.1.0 and earlier for TYPO3 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via unspecified vectors, as exploited in the wild in April 2011.
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:webempoweredchurch:wec_discussion:1.7.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:webempoweredchurch:wec_discussion:1.6.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:webempoweredchurch:wec_discussion:1.6.3:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:webempoweredchurch:wec_discussion:2.0.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:webempoweredchurch:wec_discussion:2.0.3:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:webempoweredchurch:wec_discussion:1.6.2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:webempoweredchurch:wec_discussion:2.0.2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:webempoweredchurch:wec_discussion:1.6.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:webempoweredchurch:wec_discussion:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:webempoweredchurch:wec_discussion:2.0.4:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:typo3:typo3:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]

external_references.description: This object was created using cve2stix from the Signals Corps.
